law.catch_line: A virtual school shall provide to the parent or guardian of each enrolled student:...

text.section:
A virtual school shall provide to the parent or guardian of each enrolled student:
Instructional materials, including software; and
Information on the closest public facility that offers access to a computer, printer, and Internet connection.
A virtual school may not provide funds for the purchase of instructional programs or materials to a student or to a student's parent or guardian.
